titles.title: Health Insurance Lemon Law Act
Health Insurance Lemon Law Act

To amend the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act and the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to establish a special enrollment periods for eligible individuals who are enrolled in non-compliant health plans, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Education and Labor, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
